item.title: Pathologic 3 for PC launches January 9, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Steam Next Fest: October 2025 Edition demo now available.

Pathologic 3 will launch for PC via Steam on January 9, 2026, publisher HypeTrain Digital and developer Ice-Pick Lodge announced. PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions will follow at a later date. A new demo is available now as part of Steam Next Fest: October 2025 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via HypeTrain Digital:

About the Game

Pathologic 3 continues the cult series about a mysterious plague in a distant steppe city. It’s a psychological detective story: you play as Daniil Dankovsky, a metropolitan physician who arrives to meet an “immortal” man, but is forced to lead the fight against the epidemic and try to save the city in just 12 days.

In this psychological horror game, you are a doctor with only 12 days to save a town from a mysterious plague. Make ruthless decisions and diagnose with precision. Shape the town’s future and rewrite the past. Hold yourself together while it all falls apart.

Demo

Daniil Dankovsky, the Bachelor, arrives in the City-on-Gorkhon. He wants to meet an immortal man. See you at the point of arrival. We’ll be waiting on the platform to help with his luggage.

  • A new introduction to the full game—entirely unique content we haven’t shown anywhere before.
  • Town-on-Gorkhon: explore the streets and the city’s “impossible” architecture.
  • Memorable characters and meaningful choices: you decide who to save.
  • You are a Doctor in search of truth: examine and question patients to spot lies and make accurate diagnoses.
  • Fieldwork: comb through homes and districts to unravel the city’s mysteries.
  • Localizations: English, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, German, and Italian are available now.
  • Full controller support! (Beta option.)

Watch a new trailer below.

Politics / Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/pathologic-3-for-pc-launches-january-9-2026

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide demo now available for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Play the first levels of the game.

A demo for for SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is now available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, publisher THQ Nordic and developer Purple Lamp Studios announced.

Here is an overview of the demo and game, via THQ Nordic:

The Demo

Play the first levels of the game, switch seamlessly between SpongeBob and Patrick and try out Patrick’s brand new abilities!

The Game

How do you stop the two biggest egos of the Seven Seas from fighting? A clash between the Flying Dutchman and King Neptune has unleashed ghostly mayhem all over Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob and Patrick will need all their skills, bravery and—dare I say—wit, to return life to what passes for normal in their undersea home. Join Bikini Bottom’s most notorious duo on their ghostliest adventure yet!

  • Switch seamlessly between SpongeBob and Patrick.
  • Combine SpongeBob and Patrick’s unique platforming skills.
  • Master Patrick’s brand-new skills like grappling and burrowing.
  • Experience a new ghostly story.
  • Fully voiced by the original cast of the show.
  • Visit iconic locations like Neptune’s Palace and Mount Bikini.
  • Battle epic bosses like the Flying Dutchman, King Neptune and Hibernation Sandy.

SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam on November 18.

Watch a new trailer below.

Demo Launch Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/spongebob-squarepants-titans-of-the-tide-demo-now-available-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc
